channel.title: ZeroPulse
channel.description:
[b]Name:[/b] ZeroPulse [b]Cache:[/b] 317 or 377 No silabsoft or modified clients(added items,NPCs) [b]Base:[/b] Scratch [b]Beta:[/b] Unknown [b]Release:[/b] Unknown
1) Made base - No lifing hurts. 2) Started work on packets 3) Walking packet* 4) Other packets ** 5) Teleports 6) Server GUI 7) Crap Cleaner (to reduce lagg) 8) ServerGUI Remade! 9) Firemaking (First Skill) 10) NPC Combat (Basic atm) 11) Fixed Char Interface! 12) Made some minor adjustments 13) Implemented SQL 14) Woodcutting 15) Herblore
* = Couldent be bothered to write from scratch yet, will be done in future. ** = Added all essential Packets The client may be worked on by someone else, please dont ask about this.
[b]ServerGUI:[/b] [img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/4580/serverguixi9.png[/img]
[b]Firemaking:[/b]
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=24cacgg&s=3]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=24cacgg&s=3[/url] Note: this is not finished yet.
~End~
Thanks for reading. Posts are appreciated.

item.title: ZeroPulse
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

You better start re-writing from scratch fast. You’re going to have big competition in freshly-written Java based RS2 Private Servers/Emulators with me. Also make sure you have server-side scripting.

Read full topic
